segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water overflowing and forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost like she's in her own little world, oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinets, creating a real mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the water on her feet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron, so maybe she's used to the kitchen being a bit chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this is next level, the floor is going to be a lake soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it gets out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that plate, it's like nothing else exists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit anxious watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
